channel.title: Posts on Abhilash's Space
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Abhilash's Space

item.title: Using Hugo page bundles
item.description: Page bundles are an optional way to organize page resources within Hugo. You can opt-in to using page bundles in Hugo Clarity with `usePageBundles` in your site configuration --- or in a page's front matter.

item.title: Using Notices
item.description:
The "Notices" shortcode enables you to call out pieces of information - sidebars, warnings, tips, etc.

To create a notice on a page, you can use the notice shortcode.
You use the notice shortcode, with the first parameter being one of note, info, tip, and warning. Then add a title for your note in quotes as the second parameter. The inner body of the note can be whatever markdown you want to create.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Placeholder Text
item.description:
Hello

[Your Name]

[Your Job Title or Professional Summary]

[Email Address] | [Phone Number] | [LinkedIn Profile] | [Portfolio/Website URL]

Skills

  • Technical Skills: [List technical skills, e.g., programming languages, tools, frameworks]
  • Soft Skills: [List soft skills, e.g., communication, teamwork]
  • Other Skills: [List other relevant skills]

Experience

[Job Title], [Company Name]

[City, State] | [Start Date] - [End Date or Present]

  • [Brief description of your role and responsibilities]
  • [Key accomplishments or projects completed, using bullet points]

[Job Title], [Company Name]

[City, State] | [Start Date] - [End Date]

  • [Brief description of your role and responsibilities]
  • [Key accomplishments or projects completed, using bullet points]

Education

[Degree], [Institution Name]

[City, State or Online] | [Graduation Year or Expected Graduation Year]

  • Relevant Coursework: [List relevant coursework or academic projects]

Certifications

  • [Certification Name], [Awarding Organization] | [Year Earned]

Projects

[Project Title]

[Brief description of the project and its purpose]

  • Technologies Used: [List technologies or tools used]
  • Key Contributions:
    • [Describe your role and what you accomplished in the project]

[Project Title]

[Brief description of the project and its purpose]

  • Technologies Used: [List technologies or tools used]
  • Key Contributions:
    • [Describe your role and what you accomplished in the project]

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.
